active-feature-license.query: SELECT Id, Assignee.CRM_NAV_Ident__c, PermissionSetLicense.MasterLabel, Assignee.Profile.UserLicense.Name, Assignee.LastLoginDate FROM PermissionSetLicenseAssign WHERE Assignee.IsActive = true AND Assignee.Profile.UserLicense.Name IN ('Salesforce', 'Salesforce Platform', 'Customer Community Plus')

active-salesforce-user.query: SELECT Id, CRM_NAV_Ident__c, LastLoginDate, Profile.UserLicense.Name FROM User WHERE IsActive = true AND Profile.UserLicense.Name IN ('Salesforce', 'Salesforce Platform', 'Customer Community Plus')

community-user-login.query: SELECT Id, LoginTime, NetworkId, UserId FROM LoginHistory WHERE LoginTime = TODAY AND NetworkId != Null
